name: Provisions Master
description: Improves your ability to gather loot and grants access to the wares of the portable provisioner.

ranks.effect: Allows you to purchase a portable provisioner from any WvW outfitter. This item allows you to purchase siege-weapon blueprints from anywhere.
Allows you to also purchase tricks and traps from the portable provisioner.
Allows you to also purchase food and utility consumables from the portable provisioner.
Learn to automatically pick up loot from fallen foes.
Increases the number of Badges of Honor found when looting fallen foes.
Unlocks Heart of Thorns recipes, sigils, and runes for the Heroics Notary vendor.
Allowed to glide in territories your world owns.
You can now slow down in midair.
You can now lean forward, increasing gliding speed.
You can now evade while gliding.
Learn to glide with such efficiency that you no longer use endurance except when leaning forward.

name: Warclaw Mastery
description: Unlock the warclaw mount, its skills, and its abilities.

ranks.effect: Unlock the Warclaw Companion achievement.
While mounted, periodically grant nearby allies the ability to run at warclaw speed.
Your warclaw gains an extra stamina bar.
Battle Maul deals increased damage to enemies who are in a downed state.
Unlock a second skill that allows your warclaw to detect enemies.
Unlock a third skill that allows your warclaw to pull on gates to damage them.
Unlock a fourth skill that enables you to throw a spear at a mounted player, dismounting you both.
